verses.verse: Who <S%G5607>was<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%> to him that <S%G4160>appointed<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> was faithful <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3624>house.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> man was counted <S%G515>worthy<s%> of <S%G4119>more<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> <S%G2596>inasmuch<s%> <S%G3745><s%> as he who hath <S%G2680>builded<s%> the <S%G846>house<s%> <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G4119>more<s%> <S%G5092>honor<s%> than <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3624>house.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%> is <S%G2680>builded<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> man; <S%G1161>but<s%> he that <S%G2680>built<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> is <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G3303>verily<s%> was <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3624>house,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G2324>servant,<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> a <S%G3142>testimony<s%> of those things which were to be spoken <S%G2980>after;<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G5207>son<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> his <S%G848>own<s%> <S%G3624>house;<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%> <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G2249>we,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G4007><s%> we hold <S%G2722>fast<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3954>confidence<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2745>rejoicing<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G949>firm<s%> <S%G3360>unto<s%> the <S%G5056>end.<s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> I was <S%G4360>grieved<s%> with <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G1074>generation,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> They do <S%G104>always<s%> <S%G4105>err<s%> in their <S%G2588>heart;<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> have <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1097>known<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3598>ways.<s%>

Take <S%G991>heed,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G3379>lest<s%> there <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%> an <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> of <S%G570>unbelief,<s%> in <S%G868>departing<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

But <S%G235><s%> <S%G3870>exhort<s%> one <S%G1438>another<s%> <S%G2596>daily,<s%> <S%G1538><s%> <S%G2250><s%> <S%G891>while<s%> <S%G3757><s%> <S%G3588>it<s%> is <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G4594>Today;<s%> <S%G3363>lest<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> be <S%G4645>hardened<s%> through the <S%G539>deceitfulness<s%> of <S%G266>sin.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> we are <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G3353>partakers<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G4007><s%> we <S%G2722>hold<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G746>beginning<s%> of our <S%G5287>confidence<s%> <S%G949>steadfast<s%> <S%G3360>unto<s%> the <S%G5056>end;<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5100>some,<s%> when they had <S%G191>heard,<s%> did <S%G3893>provoke:<s%> <S%G235>howbeit<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that <S%G1831>came<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G125>Egypt<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3475>Moses.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> with <S%G5101>whom<s%> was he <S%G4360>grieved<s%> <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G2094>years?<s%> was it <S%G3780>not<s%> with them that had <S%G264>sinned,<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G2966>carcasses<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2048>wilderness?<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> to <S%G5101>whom<s%> <S%G3660>swore<s%> he that they should <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G2663>rest,<s%> <S%G1508>but<s%> to them that believed <S%G544>not?<s%>
